reviews.author: Barbara Hansen
reviews.review: I had moved in right when I turned 55 into a 2 bedroom apartment.  Due to personal issues, I moved out, but returned since my first experience was fantastic.  Since coming back, there is a list a mile long NOT to stay here.  Number one;

ownerResponse.text: Barbara, we certainly don't like seeing a current resident so unhappy. That's not what Affinity is about! Some of these items, we have been able to address with you via email and offered to discuss further in person or over the phone at  More

reviews.author: Cecilia
reviews.review: Being here is home to me - the place is always clean, cheerful with happy people not only living here but the ones who are our refuge of help or questions anytime, Laurie, Amber, Kristin.  Always smile and ask us how we are doing.  The

reviews.author: Laura Dutton
reviews.review: We  recently moved to Affinity from Austin, Texas. The administrative staff,; Kristin , Amber and Laurie were all absolutely wonderful to deal with. There were a lot of logistics involved and they were very professional and accommodating.

ownerResponse.text: What an amazing review!  Thank you so much, Laura.  We are happy you and Lee have become members of our community!

reviews.author: Debbie Sage
reviews.review: We love living here at Affinity in Bellingham! The staff are simply lovely and if we need anything at all they're quick to help.  The community of residents are friendly and there are many ways to be involved and stay connected if you want

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review Debbie!  We are so happy to have you as a resident!

reviews.author: Barbara Hansen
reviews.review: Maintenance department is exceptional. Even though there are only 2 maintenance persons, they are excellent.  Housekeeping is also short shorthanded.  Front desk person is there when scheduled to work.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review Barbara!  We appreciate you and your feedback!

reviews.author: Rod Elin
reviews.review: We've been here going on four years this May and have found the perfect independent living facility.  It's quiet, secure, with loads of amenities and activities.  The maintenance is top drawer and quick to respond as is the management and

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Rod, 
Thank you for taking the time to provide a great review for Affinity in Bellingham!  We're lucky to have you as a resident here!  Have the best day.
Laurie

reviews.author: Kelly Powell
reviews.review: I have lived at Affinity for almost 2yrs years now & I have enjoyed every second of it! The Mgr. Laurie does her job extremely well to ensure that we feel safe, secure, happy, heard, and genuinely cared for! What other apartment complex

ownerResponse.text:
Good morning Kelly!
Thank you so much for your great review!  I have shared this review with the team.
Have a great day.

reviews.author: china m
reviews.review: This is a wonderful place to live and we have enjoyed being a part of the Affinity community. There are so many opportunities to take advantage of within close proximity, as well as the social events available here. We've met so many lovely

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for so much for your wonderful review!  We appreciate it so much.

reviews.author: Susan Harmon
reviews.review: These are what I consider upscale apartments for 55+ ages. They offer a lot of amenities in the apartment building, including an elevator. There are usually monthly activities taking place. They maintain the interior and exterior of the

reviews.author: Jim Bergner
reviews.review: I have lived here for three years now and enjoy the community here.  The residents here are mostly very friendly and easygoing.  We have many social functions much like a large extended family.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Jim,
Thank you for your kind words.  We enjoy having you as part of the Affinity Family!

reviews.author: Kristl B. Binder
reviews.review: Perfect  such a good and wonderful place. Theres everything there  a 24/7 salt water indoor swimming pool, friendly personal. The grounds so wonderfully kept. Organised activities such as gymnastics (Silver Sneakers) twice a week,

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Kristl,
Thank you so much for your kind words and positive review.  We really appreciate it.

reviews.author: William Gerrie
reviews.review: My wife and I have found living at Affinity convenient, comfortable and pleasant. The current management staff is responsive, efficient, dependable and friendly. Since the new manager came on board, facility upkeep and appearance are better

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your kind and insightful review! At Affinity at Bellingham, we strive to provide excellent customer service and take pride in our amenities. We are so glad to hear you have enjoyed everything Affinity has to offer and we hope to have you as a resident for a long time.

reviews.author: Heather Perks
reviews.review: I have been a resident at Affinity Bellingham for approximately 2 months and have found it to be a welcoming community with many opportunities for activities within the building. Additionally there are many organized in the greater Bellingham community as well as much farther afield.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for your positive review Heather!  We're so happy that you chose Affinity as your new home!

reviews.author: Nancy Haapala
reviews.review: I want to let people know that at the age of 85 and living here for FIVE years - it so comfortable living at Affinity@Bellingham.  The Staff is so special, the people living here are so friendly that it feels like home!    What more could you ask for!

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Nancy,
Thank you so much for your review.  We love having you as a resident here at Affinity and we think you're pretty great as well.

reviews.author: Sandra Laney
reviews.review: I have lived here in since January 2019, and am very satisfied. The staff attends to every concern and need - whether minor, major, or even imagined - with a smile and almost always immediate resolution!

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for the kind review! We appreciate you as a resident and hope to continue to provide our best customer service.

reviews.author: John Sage
reviews.review: We love it here.  Amazing amenities. Pet friendly. Great central location with quick and easy access to town and services.  Super friendly staff that really care about you.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks for a great review John, we're so happy you chose Affinity as your place to live!

reviews.author: p Brooks
reviews.review:
Lived here for 6 years.  Great place and great people.  Hated
to move, but we did, to another affinity location out of state.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review Pete!  It means a lot!  We hope you are settled in at your new Affinity home!

reviews.author: Darlene Moore
reviews.review: When i was looking for a place to live..One of my first concerns was parking.. I was told it was not a ptoblem. I chose an apartment rt by elevator...now that i paid moved in i am told i have to apply my handicap parking thru the state means nothing...common sincee does not prevail.. I do not understand how it is even legal...

ownerResponse.text: Good Afternoon Darlene,  I am sorry to hear that our parking has not met your expectations. We offer free parking to all of our residents and have handicapped spots available. Residents are also offered carports and garages for an  More

reviews.author: Bruce Roberts
reviews.review: They run loud cleaning equipment in the parking lot of the Home Depot across the street from this housing complex!  This occurs in the middle of the night.  So you can expect to get no sleep a couple of times a month.  What a great disappointment this has been.

ownerResponse.text: Good Afternoon Bruce, I am sorry you are having noise issues with our surrounding businesses. Here at The Affinity at Bellingham, we strive to minimize any unreasonable noise that we can control. Living in an urban area can unfortunately  More

reviews.author: Michael Blair
reviews.review: Norman did a wonderful repair in a timely manner and cleaned up after completion.  Thank you

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Michael, 
Thanks for taking the time to submit a review!  We appreciate you.  Happy New Year!
Laurie

reviews.author: Kathi Bjorn
reviews.review: Pay once for everything: electricity. Water. Garbage, cable. Internet, etc. It's your living. Not management. So many amenities. Good management people.

ownerResponse.text: Good Afternoon Kathi, thank you for your kind review! The Affinity at Bellingham is happy to provide utilities to their residents. If you have any questions or concerns the leasing staff is happy to help!

reviews.author: Elizabeth Haro
reviews.review: Move in has been smooth and welcoming

ownerResponse.text:
Thank you for your review Elizabeth.  We are so happy to have you and Neptune join our community!  Please let us know if there's anything you need.
Laurie

reviews.author: Harvey Keitel
reviews.review: Some rat made my life a living hell for the entire summer and got away with it

ownerResponse.text: Good Afternoon Harvey, I understand that this incident happened a while ago, but I wanted to reach out. The leasing staff at The Affinity at Bellingham would be happy to help you with any issues you may be having. Please feel free to stop by the office if you need further assistance.

reviews.author: Susan Harmon
reviews.review: Nice place...well managed.

reviews.author: Maria
reviews.review: Great customer service.

reviews.author: Connie Audette
reviews.review: I have friends that live it

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your positive review! Have you considered becoming neighbors with your friends? :)

reviews.author: Gayle L.
reviews.review: A wonderful place !!

reviews.review: Thare good

Thank you!
